content:
Looks like GitHub is building its own version of Bors:
https://github.blog/changelog/2021-10-27-pull-request-merge-queue-limited-beta/
Do we want to give it a go?
Nice find! I've requested to join the waitlist, since it doesn't obligate us to actually use it
The commit messages are probably not as nice as the once we get with bros.
It seems that they don't squash commits in PRs.
